channel.title: The Best of the Worst - A Black Mesa Montage Series
channel.description:
Hello ladies 'n' gentlemen, just popping up a quick post here to (quite shamelessly advertise) a video series I am uploading to a youtube channel that I co-host with a friend of mine. It is a montage of comedic and rather amusing moments during my playthrough of the Black Mesa mod. I hope you watch and hopefully enjoy.
Part 1: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gdbvAIeJW-Q[/url] Part 2: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GV_bq4NVDLM[/url] Part 3: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=12YluDylkdw[/url]
Many thanks.
-Farlen, GodDamnedGaming
